title: Heather Watson's Injury and Missing a Big Tennis Tournament
summary: Heather Watson is a tennis player from Britain who has been hurt and cannot play in the Australian Open, a big tennis tournament this month. She hurt her glute muscle in August 2025 and has not played a match since then. This is her first big injury in her 17-year career. She is now ranked 269th in the world and ninth in Britain. Watson is training in Florida and hopes to return to playing tennis by the end of February. She said she misses tennis and feels sad about missing the Australian Open, but it makes her want to come back stronger. She has won mixed doubles at Wimbledon before and is working hard to get better.
